\section{Installation}
\label{\detokenize{quick_start:installation}}\begin{itemize}
\item {} 
\sphinxAtStartPar
PyPi install

\begin{sphinxVerbatim}[commandchars=\\\{\}]
pip\PYG{+w}{ }install\PYG{+w}{ }readlammpsdata
\end{sphinxVerbatim}

\item {} 
\sphinxAtStartPar
Github install

\begin{sphinxVerbatim}[commandchars=\\\{\}]
git\PYG{+w}{ }clone\PYG{+w}{ }git@github.com:eastsheng/readlammpsdata.git
\PYG{n+nb}{cd}\PYG{+w}{ }readlammpsdata
pip\PYG{+w}{ }install\PYG{+w}{ }.
\end{sphinxVerbatim}

\end{itemize}

\PYG{n}{lmp} \PYG{o}{=}\PYG{l+s+s2}{\PYGZdq{}}\PYG{l+s+s2}{PVP.lmp}\PYG{l+s+s2}{\PYGZdq{}}
\PYG{n}{trems} \PYG{o}{=} \PYG{n}{rld}\PYG{o}{.}\PYG{n}{read\PYGZus{}terms}\PYG{p}{(}\PYG{n}{lmp}\PYG{p}{)}
\PYG{n+nb}{print}\PYG{p}{(}\PYG{n}{trems}\PYG{p}{)}
\PYG{l+s+sd}{\PYGZdq{}\PYGZdq{}\PYGZdq{}output}
\PYG{l+s+sd}{[\PYGZsq{}Masses\PYGZsq{}, \PYGZsq{}Pair Coeffs\PYGZsq{}, \PYGZsq{}Bond Coeffs\PYGZsq{}, \PYGZsq{}Angle Coeffs\PYGZsq{}, \PYGZsq{}Dihedral Coeffs\PYGZsq{}, \PYGZsq{}Improper Coeffs\PYGZsq{}, \PYGZsq{}Atoms \PYGZsh{} full\PYGZsq{}, \PYGZsq{}Bonds\PYGZsq{}, \PYGZsq{}Angles\PYGZsq{}, \PYGZsq{}Dihedrals\PYGZsq{}, \PYGZsq{}Impropers\PYGZsq{}]}

\section{Read charges}
\label{\detokenize{examples:read-charges}}
\begin{sphinxVerbatim}[commandchars=\\\{\}]
\PYG{n}{charges} \PYG{o}{=} \PYG{n}{rld}\PYG{o}{.}\PYG{n}{read\PYGZus{}charges}\PYG{p}{(}\PYG{n}{lmp}\PYG{p}{)}
\PYG{n+nb}{print}\PYG{p}{(}\PYG{l+s+s2}{\PYGZdq{}}\PYG{l+s+s2}{Charges of atoms are }\PYG{l+s+si}{\PYGZpc{}s}\PYG{l+s+s2}{\PYGZdq{}} \PYG{o}{\PYGZpc{}}\PYG{n}{charges}\PYG{p}{)}
\PYG{n+nb}{print}\PYG{p}{(}\PYG{n+nb}{round}\PYG{p}{(}\PYG{n+nb}{sum}\PYG{p}{(}\PYG{n}{charges}\PYG{p}{)}\PYG{p}{,}\PYG{l+m+mi}{6}\PYG{p}{)}\PYG{p}{)}
\PYG{l+s+sd}{\PYGZdq{}\PYGZdq{}\PYGZdq{}}
\PYG{l+s+sd}{\PYGZgt{}\PYGZgt{}\PYGZgt{} Read charges successfully !}
